name: Coin Tycoon
description:
The update to your favorite coin pusher game is here!!!

***Featured in iTunes in 98 places and still counting!!!***
Thank you all for your support!!

Do you want to be the next tycoon of the world? Come join us here at Coin Tycoon!

Drop your coins to the machine with your best luck and collect as many coins as you can. If you are lucky enough, you will get lots of different collection items as prizes! Good luck!

***Great Features***

- Simple gameplay with non-stop exciting gaming moments
- Surreal coin pusher machine with a magnificent gaming interface
- Luxurious collection items
- Relaxing coin pusher sound effects
- Level-up system, adds more fun challenges

More features, prizes and updates coming REAL soon!!
